summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowInCellEditing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值，表示视图的筛选器。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) value that represents the filter for a view.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性的值是一个字符串，在 DAV 搜索和定位 (DASL) 语法中，表示当前视图的筛选器。有关使用视图中的筛选项目的 DASL 语法的详细信息，请参阅筛选项目

The value of this property is a string, in DAV Searching and Locating (DASL) syntax, that represents the current filter for the view. For more information about using DASL syntax to filter items in a view, see Filtering Items

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GoToDate([in]valuetype System.DateTime Date) runtime managed

param.name: Date

span.span: The date to which the view should be changed.

summary.span: 更改当前视图用来显示信息的日期。

span.span: Changes the date used by the current view to display information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HeadingsFont As ViewFont

summary.span: 返回对象，表示用于显示在每张卡片的标题的字体对象。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the font used to display the heading of each card in the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Language { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值，表示视图的语言设置。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) value that represents the language setting for the view.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 语言属性使用字符串（C# 中的字符串） 来表示 ISO 语言标记。例如，"EN-US"的字符串表示"美国-英语。"的 ISO 代码
如果指定了有效的语言代码，该对象将只能在指定的语言类型视图菜单中可用。如果未不指定任何值，则对象项是可用于所有语言类型。此属性的默认值为空字符串。
The Language property uses a String (string in C#) to represent an ISO language tag. For example, the string "EN-US" represents the ISO code for "United States - English."

If a valid language code is specified, the object will only be available in the View menu for the specified language type. If no value is specified, the object item is available for all language types. The default value for this property is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool LockUserChanges { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 值，该值指示用户是否可以修改视图的设置。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) value that indicates whether a user can modify the settings of the view.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 如果，则返回 True，则用户可以修改指定视图的设置。但是，不会保存界面所做的更改。如果False （默认值），任何更改将保存。
If True, the user can modify the settings of the specified view. However, changes made to the interface will not be saved. If False (the default), any changes will be saved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MultiLineFieldHeight { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置确定最小的多行中显示的字段的行数的整数(C# 中int ) 值对象。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value that determines the minimum number of lines for multiline fields displayed in the object.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性可以设置为 1 到 20 之间的值。如果此属性设置为小于 1 的值，则将该属性设置为 1。如果此属性设置为一个值大于 20，该属性设置为 20。此属性的默认值为 1。

This property can be set to a value between 1 and 20. If this property is set to a value less than 1, the property is set to 1. If this property is set to a value greater than 20, the property is set to 20. The default value for this property is 1.

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() runtime managed

summary.span: 将内置的 Microsoft Outlook 视图重置为原始设置。

span.span: Resets a built-in Microsoft Outlook view to its original settings.

span.para: 此方法仅应用于内置 Outlook 视图。
This method works only on built-in Outlook views.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SaveOption As OlViewSaveOption

summary.span: 返回附加到视图的常量，指定指定的视图位于的文件夹和读取的权限。

span.span: Returns an constant that specifies the folders in which the specified view is available and the read permissions attached to the view.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: SaveOption属性的值时设置对象通过使用创建方法集合。
The value of the SaveOption property is set when the object is created by using the method of the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Session As NameSpace

summary.span: 返回对象的当前会话。

span.span: Returns the object for the current session.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: Session属性和可以交替使用方法来获取当前会话的NameSpace对象。这两个成员的作用相同。例如，以下语句对执行相同的功能：

The Session property and the method can be used interchangeably to obtain the NameSpace object for the current session. Both members serve the same purpose. For example, the following pairs of statements perform the same function:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowEmptyFields { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool ) 值，该值指示是否对象是内置 Outlook 视图。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) value that indicates whether the object is a built-in Outlook view.

span.para: 方法仅用于视图如果此属性的值设置为True。
The method can only be used on a view if the value of this property is set to True.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指示卡中的宽度 （以字符为单位） 的整数(C# 中int ) 值对象。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer (int in C#) value indicating the width (in characters) of cards in the object.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性可以设置为 20 和 1000年之间的值。如果此属性设置为小于 20 的值，该属性设置为 20。如果此属性设置为一个值大于 1000年，该属性设置为 1000年。
取决于此属性的默认值属性值为对象显示在视图：

This property can be set to a value between 20 and 1000. If this property is set to a value less than 20, the property is set to 20. If this property is set to a value greater than 1000, the property is set to 1000.
The default value for this property depends on the property value of the object displayed by the view:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ XML { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 值，指定视图的 XML 定义。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) value that specifies the XML definition of the view.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: XML 定义描述视图类型使用一系列的标记和关键字对应的视图本身的各种属性。创建视图时，分析的 XML 定义呈现新视图的设置。
，以确定如何 XML 结构应时创建视图，您可以通过使用 Outlook 用户界面创建视图，然后您可以检索该视图的XML属性。

The XML definition describes the view type by using a series of tags and keywords corresponding to various properties of the view itself. When the view is created, the XML definition is parsed to render the settings for the new view.
To determine how the XML should be structured when creating views, you can create a view by using the Outlook user interface and then you can retrieve the XML property for that view.
